titleStmt.title: Prognosticacion, drawen out of the bookes of Ipocras, Avicen, and other notable auctours of physycke, shewynge the daunger of dyvers syckenesses, that is to saye, whether in peryl of death be in them or not, the pleasure of almyghty God reseruyd..
Prognostica. English
titleStmt.author: Hippocrates.

titleStmt.title: Prognosticacion, drawen out of the bookes of Ipocras, Avicen, and other notable auctours of physycke, shewynge the daunger of dyvers syckenesses, that is to saye, whether in peryl of death be in them or not, the pleasure of almyghty God reseruyd..
Prognostica. English
titleStmt.author: Hippocrates.
Avicenna, 980?-1037.

publicationStmt.publisher: Jmprynted by me Robert Wyer. Cum priuilegio, ad imprimendum solum.,

notesStmt.note: Publisher from colophon; date suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Cut on t.p. enclosed on sides by caption: The Pronosticacion for this yeare. Above (in ms.): 1550.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
